body.name: Simmons Kids Theo 6-in-1 Convertible Crib - Greenguard Gold Certified, Black/Textured Almond
body.stockDetail: Only 16 left in stock (more on the way).
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 2 mins
features: 6-IN-1 CRIB: Crib converts to toddler bed, daybed, sofa, full size bed with headboard and footboard and full size bed with headboard only (Daybed/Sofa Rail included; Toddler Guardrail #W100725, Full Size Bed Rails #0050 sold separately)

GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED: This Convertible Crib meets the most stringent chemical emissions standards to create a healthier home for your child. Tested for more than 10,000 chemicals and VOCs, this crib is certified to contribute to cleaner indoor air

SAFE OPTION: JPMA certified to meet or exceed all safety standards set by the CPSC & ASTM | Non-toxic multi-step painting process is lead and phthalate safe | Made of sustainable woods like New Zealand Pine, Poplar and TSCA compliant engineered wood

SIZE: Assembled size: 54.25"W x 29.50"D x 45"H | Adjustable height mattress support with 3 convenient positions to grow with your baby | From Floor: 34.25"; From Top Mattress Support Position: 16.50"; From Bottom Mattress Support Position: 26.50"

COORDINATING ITEMS: Pair the Theo Crib with the matching Theo 3 Drawer Dresser |Uses a standard size crib mattress (sold separately) | To ensure the perfect fit pair your crib with a Delta Children, Simmons Kids, Serta or Beautyrest crib mattress
body.description: The Theo 6-in-1 Convertible Baby Crib by Simmons Kids gives a modern-meets-timeless feel with its tall headboard that features a subtle curve and three inset panels of airy natural-colored cane. Designed to be an on-trend focal point for your traditional, contemporary, coastal or bohemian nursery, this versatile crib will be the only bed your child ever needs. It has an adjustable height mattress support, so you can easily adjust it as your baby grows, just lower the mattress height as your child begins to sit or stand. This versatile crib can also be converted into a toddler bed, daybed, sofa and full-size bed with or without footboard (Daybed/Sofa Rail included, Toddler Guardrail #W100725 and Full Size Bed Rails #0050 sold separately). Plus, it’s GREENGUARD Gold Certified, which means it’s built to contribute to cleaner air for a healthy home. Available in Bianca White and Ebony. Pair this crib with the Theo 3 Drawer Dresser with Changing Top to complete your space.Producing the finest furniture for over 80 years, Simmons Kids has always been committed to the safety of every family. All Simmons Kids cribs are JPMA certified, and are rigorously tested to meet or exceed all industry safety standards.
